relating to the custom of giving money to the poor on Maundy Thursday (= the Thursday before Easter). In modern times in the UK , special coins are given out by the Queen at a special ceremony at a cathedral (= a large church ) every Maundy Thursday. : The Queen dispenses the Royal Maundy Money, at a different cathedral every year. the Maundy ceremony
